name: Render Plug-in
summary: Learn about .RPI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Commonly used by Kega Fusion, a cross-platform emulator for various game systems. Some of the consoles include: Sega SG1000, Game Gear, Genesis/Megadrive, and System Master.

description: Plug-in used by game system emulators; contains features that extend and enhance gameplay, such as a Magnification Filter that increases clarity of images and video seen during gameplay.
